Uses of Package
org.bukkit.enchantments

Packages that use org.bukkit.enchantments 
Package Description
org.bukkit
The root package of the Bukkit API, contains generalized API classes.
org.bukkit.enchantments
Classes relating to the specialized enhancements to item stacks, as part of the meta data.
org.bukkit.event.enchantment
Events triggered from an enchantment table.
org.bukkit.inventory
Classes involved in manipulating player inventories and item interactions.
org.bukkit.inventory.meta
The interfaces used when manipulating extra data can can be stored inside item stacks.
  • Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit 
    Class Description
    Enchantment
    The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
  • Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.enchantments 
    Class Description
    Enchantment
    The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
    EnchantmentTarget
    Represents the applicable target for a Enchantment
  • Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.event.enchantment 
    Class Description
    Enchantment
    The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
    EnchantmentOffer
    A class for the available enchantment offers in the enchantment table.
  • Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.inventory 
    Class Description
    Enchantment
    The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
  • Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.inventory.meta 
    Class Description
    Enchantment
    The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
